Our Services

Every service we offer is designed specifically for Bermuda grass in the Garner, NC climate. Core services are included with your membership. Add-ons are available to members as needed.

Core Membership Services

Included with every membership

Bermuda Mowing Program

Precision mowing at the right height, on the right schedule, based on your Bermuda's growth stage and Garner's seasonal conditions.

Learn more →

Fertilization Program

A soil-test-driven fertilization schedule with 4 to 6 applications per year, timed to Bermuda's nutrient demands in Wake County.

Learn more →

Add-On Services

Available to members

Pre-Emergent Weed Control

Seasonal pre-emergent herbicide applications to prevent crabgrass, goosegrass, and broadleaf weeds before they germinate.

Learn more →

Mulch Installation

Professional mulch installation for your landscape beds. Hardwood, pine bark, and dyed mulch options available.

Learn more →

Topdressing & Leveling

Sand and compost topdressing to smooth uneven turf, fill low spots, and encourage denser Bermuda growth.

Learn more →
